thread.title: E bay keep changing the format of pages it's getting too complex can I get older e bay system back
thread.title_full: E bay keep changing the format of pages it's getting too complex can I get older e bay system back

author: Adventure
title: E bay keep changing the format of pages it's getting too complex can I get older e bay system back
text:
09-01-2025 10:50 PM
E bay keep changing and updating the pages and the way the various bits work so it’s getting more and more complex. Maybe not for young people but it’s getting to a point where it takes me a long time to learn something then they change it is it possible to reset e bay to the older system that was in place about a year ago, without all the seller information all the ai stuff, just basic. It’s getting so complex I can’t find or sort much as it seems everything is changing. Getting to a point where I’m likely going to stop using e bay.
09-01-2025 11:27 PM
Is this any better?
https://www.ebay.co.uk/mys/overview?MyEbay&gbh=1&source=GBH
